import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import '../index.css' import '../styles/personalInfo.scss' import buttonIcon from '../images/buttonIcon.png' const PersonalInformation = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const [massage, setMassage] = useState('') let isItError = true const handleChange = event => { setMassage(event.target.value) } const handleClick = event => { event.preventDefault() let inputName = document.getElementById('name') if(massage.trim().length <= 2){ inputName.classList.remove('inputSuccsess') inputName.classList.add('inputError') isItError = true }else{ inputName.classList.remove('inputError') inputName.classList.add('inputSuccsess') saveInformation(inputName.value) isItError = false } let inputEmail = document.getElementById('email') if(!inputEmail.value.includes('@redberry.ge')){ inputEmail.classList.remove('inputSuccsess') inputEmail.classList.add('inputError') isItError = true }else{ inputEmail.classList.remove('inputError') inputEmail.classList.add('inputSuccsess') saveInformation(inputEmail.value) isItError = false } let inputPhone = document.getElementById('phone') if(inputPhone.value.length < 9){ inputPhone.classList.remove('inputSuccsess') inputPhone.classList.add('inputError') isItError = true }else{ inputPhone.classList.remove('inputError') inputPhone.classList.add('inputSuccsess') saveInformation(inputPhone.value) isItError = false } let inputDate = document.getElementById('date') if(inputDate.value.length === 0){ inputDate.classList.remove('inputSuccsess') inputDate.classList.add('inputError') isItError = true }else{ inputDate.classList.remove('inputError') inputDate.classList.add('inputSuccsess') saveInformation(inputDate.value) isItError = false } } const saveInformation = (props) => { console.log(props) console.log(isItError) } return (

) } export default PersonalInformation
